title: Scrabble Complete.iso-{xExUxBxExRx}
description:
Scrabble Complete (.iso)                  
---------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------

Challenge you Scrabble Skills with the classic Scrabble
game and a dozen addictive mini-games!Scrabble Blitz,
Anagrams,3-Letter Word games and more will have you 
thinking fast and testing you Scrabble savvy.Increase 
your word wizardy with Scrabble Complete! 

---------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------

                        Features:

*Customizable levels of play,from beginner to expert.

*Solo play,fast moving mini-games,and online matches
for up to four players.

*Merriam-Webster`s "Offical" Scrabble players dictionary
(3rd Ed.)

---------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------

                   SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

OS:Windows 98/Me/XP *(?Vista?)*

CPU:Pentium II 333MHz or Higher

RAM:32 MB (64 For XP)

HDD Space:100 MB

CD-ROM Drive:Dosen`t Really Matter :)

Video:8MB WIN32 Compatable Video Card

Sound:WIN32 Compatible Sound Card

DirectX:DirectX 8.1 or Higher

Multiplayer:Internet Access

Modem:28.8 Kbps or Faster

---------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------

                        INSTALLATION:

1.Mount .iso image file with Deamon Tools(or any other- 
  preferred Virtual Drive)

2.Follow On-Screen Installation Wizard(No Serial Required!)

3.Play.(You *MUST KEEP THE ISO IMAGE FILE IN YOU VIRTUAL
  DRIVE TO PLAY!* The game has to access the game data 
  and engine which are stored in .cab Arcives on the 
  disc.(If you know a way around this,I would love
  to know!) 

--------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------

Anarchy is no excuse for 
chaos and disorder...
   Please Seed!
